discourse_list.title: Official iOS app for Uniswap monitoring/investing

content.content: I propose assigning official Uniswap monitoring and investing app for YouBank and dedicate a grant to support the next development. Current data are not friendly for investors. And too complicated. Please install a beta and let me know your opinion. Simulator Screen Shot - iPhone 11 - 2021-02-15 at 11.08.43828×1792 143 KB
content.GPT-summary: The author proposes the development of an official iOS app for Uniswap monitoring and investing, and suggests dedicating a grant to support its development. The author notes that current data is not user-friendly for investors and too complicated. The author invites feedback on a beta version of the app. A 3rd party could provide constructive criticism or ask questions about the proposal.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal

content.content: What features exactly are you currently missing? E.g. using MetaMask I don’t struggle finding an overview of my liquidity pools. Nor assets, as these are reflected in any ERC-20 wallet as well. Can also access analytics etc. on Uniswap website.
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving constructive criticism of proposal

content.content: All missed features are described on the main YouBank page. Metamask has no info about pools. Assets are info, but not show results for hold. uniswap web has not provide APY and I do need to calculate (APY separate for fees and for hold)
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
